mapper.select: SELECT award_id AS awardId, award_name AS awardName, award_desc AS awardDesc, award_img AS awardImg, point AS needPoint, create_time AS createTime, last_edit_time AS lastEditTime, shop_id AS shopId, priority, point FROM tb_award WHERE award_id = #{awardId} AND enable_status = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_award( award_name, award_desc, award_img, point, priority, create_time, expire_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, shop_id )VALUES ( #{award.awardName}, #{award.awardDesc}, #{award.awardImg}, #{award.point}, #{award.needPoint}, #{award.priority}, NOW(), #{award.expireTime}, NOW(), '0', #{award.shopId} )
